title: A2TTS-Bengali Speaker Adaptive TTS (Text-to-Speech)-v0.5
description: Text-to-speech synthesis model tailored to match a given speaker's voice sample. We present a speaker-adaptive text-to-speech system designed for generating high-quality, natural speech across multiple low-resource Indian languages, including Bengali, Gujarati, Hindi, Marathi, Tamil, and Telugu.

title: A2TTS-Gujarati Speaker Adaptive TTS (Text-to-Speech)-v0.5
description: Text-to-speech synthesis model tailored to match a given speaker's voice sample for Gujarati language.

title: A2TTS-Kannada Speaker Adaptive TTS (Text-to-Speech)-v0.5
description: Text-to-speech synthesis model tailored to match a given speaker's voice sample for Kannada language.

title: A2TTS-Malayalam Speaker Adaptive TTS (Text-to-Speech)-v0.5
description: Text-to-speech synthesis model tailored to match a given speaker's voice sample for Malayalam language.

title: A2TTS-Marathi Speaker Adaptive TTS (Text-to-Speech)-v0.5
description: Text-to-speech synthesis model tailored to match a given speaker's voice sample for Marathi language.

title: A2TTS-Punjabi Speaker Adaptive TTS (Text-to-Speech)-v0.5
description: Text-to-speech synthesis model tailored to match a given speaker's voice sample for Punjabi language.

title: A2TTS-Tamil Speaker Adaptive TTS (Text-to-Speech)-v0.5
description: Text-to-speech synthesis model tailored to match a given speaker's voice sample for Tamil language.

title: IndicBERT - Multilingual BERT for Indian Languages
description: Pre-trained BERT model supporting 12 major Indian languages for NLP tasks including text classification, named entity recognition, and question answering.

title: IndicTranslate - Neural Machine Translation
description: State-of-the-art neural machine translation model for translating between English and 22 Indian languages.

title: Hindi OCR Model - Document Recognition
description: Optical character recognition model optimized for Hindi text in printed and handwritten documents.

title: AgriVision - Crop Disease Detection
description: Computer vision model for detecting diseases in major Indian crops including rice, wheat, and cotton.

title: MediScan - Medical Image Analysis
description: Deep learning model for analyzing X-ray and CT scan images to detect abnormalities and assist in diagnosis.

title: TrafficNet - Vehicle Detection and Counting
description: Real-time vehicle detection and counting model for traffic management and analysis.

title: SentimentIndia - Multilingual Sentiment Analysis
description: Sentiment analysis model supporting 10 Indian languages for social media and customer feedback analysis.

title: FaceRecognIndia - Face Recognition System
description: Robust face recognition model trained on diverse Indian facial features for secure authentication.

title: WeatherPredict - Monsoon Forecasting Model
description: Advanced weather prediction model specifically designed for Indian monsoon forecasting.

title: EnergyOptimizer - Smart Grid Prediction
description: Machine learning model for predicting energy demand and optimizing power grid distribution.

title: FinFraud - Financial Fraud Detection
description: Advanced fraud detection model for identifying suspicious financial transactions and patterns.

title: UrbanPlanner - City Growth Prediction
description: Predictive model for urban growth patterns and infrastructure planning for smart cities.

title: EduAssist - Student Performance Predictor
description: Model for predicting student performance and providing personalized learning recommendations.

title: AquaMonitor - Water Quality Prediction
description: Model for predicting water quality parameters and detecting contamination in water bodies.

title: RetailPredict - Demand Forecasting
description: Retail demand forecasting model for inventory optimization and supply chain management.

title: ForestGuard - Deforestation Detection
description: Satellite image analysis model for detecting and monitoring deforestation activities.

title: HealthRisk - Disease Risk Assessment
description: Predictive model for assessing disease risk based on demographic and health parameters.
